section.name: Logging in
section.p: To start using the CMS you first have to login. A successfull login will grant you with a valid JcrSession, allowing the frontend application to load the - user/group specific - frontend configuration from repository and create the Wicket component hierarchy.

subsection.name: Log in
subsection.p:
Point your browser to http://localhost:8080/. You will be presented with a login dialog.
By default you can login as one of the following users:
admin; username=admin, password=admin
author; username=author, password=author
editor; username=editor, password=editor
